items.name: Fertilized Luminous Angler Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment

items.name: Flying Fisherman Implant
items.description: Equip this implant onto a Flying Fisherman. Provides armor similar to a saddle!

items.name: Feral Boar Saddle
items.description: Equip a Feral Boar with this to ride it.

items.name: Fertilized Catfish Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment

items.name: Pelagic Crocodile Saddle
items.description: Equip a Pelagic Crocodile with this to ride it. If you have a saddle mod for Sarcosuchus, Pelagc Crocodile can use those too!

items.name: Fertilized Pelagic Crocodile Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides regular nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Atlas Drake Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides exceptional nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Forest Elephant Saddle
items.description: Equip a Forest Elephant with this to ride it.

items.name: Create Infernal
items.description: Use this to bring your newly created Infernal to life!

items.name: Atlas Giraffe Saddle
items.description: Equip an Atlas Giraffe with this to ride it.

items.name: Lodestone Golem Saddle
items.description: Equip a Lodestone Golem with this to ride it.

items.name: Activated Lodestone Golem Core
items.description: Use this to bring your newly created Lodestone Golem to life!

items.name: Lodestone Golem Core
items.description:
This trophy proves your worth as a hunter.
The core of a Lodestone Golem, that once- and still does- hold it's life energy. Can be used to create a loyal Lodestone Golem of your own.

items.name: Aegis Implant
items.description: Equip this implant onto an Aegis. Provides armor similar to a saddle!

items.name: Savage Hammerhead Saddle
items.description: Equip a Savage Hammerhead with this to ride it.

items.name: Atlas Horse Saddle
items.description:
A saddle for your horse. Useful for crafting chemical supplies on the go!

This can be used with both the vanilla horse and the atlas horse.

items.name: Atlas Kodiak Saddle
items.description: Equip an Atlas Kodiak with this to ride it. A standard Direbear can also use this too.

items.name: Fertilized Leatherwing Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides simple nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Lion Saddle
items.description: Equip a Lion with this to ride it.

items.name: Harbinger Saddle
items.description: Equip a Harbinger with this to ride it.

items.name: Naga Implant
items.description: Equip this implant onto a Naga. Provides armor similar to a saddle!

items.name: Fertilized Naga Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides regular nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Olfend Saddle
items.description: Equip a Olfend with this to ride it.

items.name: Ostrich Saddle
items.description: Equip a Ostrich with this to ride it. Turns it into a helpful travel companion, too!

items.name: Ostrich Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides basic nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Ostrich Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides basic nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Heracles Implant
items.description: Equip this implant onto a Heracles. Provides armor similar to a saddle!

items.name: Fertilized Heracles Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides simple nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Apophis Rattler Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides regular nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Razortooth Saddle
items.description: Equip a Razortooth with this to ride it.

items.name: Razortooth Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides exceptional nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Razortooth Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides extraordinary nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Pangolin Rhinoceros Saddle
items.description: Equip a Pangolin Rhinoceros with this to ride it.

items.name: Tyrant Scorpion Saddle
items.description: Equip a Tyrant Scorpion with this to ride it.

items.name: Fertilized Tyrant Scorpion Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides superior nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Hippocampus Saddle
items.description: Equip a Hippocampus with this to ride it.

items.name: Shieldhorn Saddle
items.description: Equip a Shieldhorn with this to ride it. Triceratops can also use this too!

items.name: Shieldhorn Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides simple nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Shieldhorn Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides simple nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Atlas Tiger Saddle
items.description: Equip an Atlas Tiger with this to ride it.

items.name: Tortugar Saddle
items.description: A saddle for your Tortugar. It allows for passengers! Bring lots of friends!

items.name: Fertilized Tortugar Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides exceptional nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Yakalo Saddle
items.description: Equip a Yakalo or Produce Cow with this to ride it.

items.name: Dinosaur Bone
items.description: A very ancient looking bone, must be usefull for something!

items.name: Common Mushroom
items.description: This mushroom can be found pretty much everywhere. It's tasty, and heals you slowly over time. Great in recipes!

items.name: Dragon Relic
items.description: A rune that gives armor to the Atlas Hydra and Atlas Drake similar to a saddle.

items.name: Submarine Crew Chairs
items.description: Allows three additional passengers into your submarine.

items.name: Improved Combat Module
items.description:
An improved AI component that allows combat and strength components to exert more power. In less technical terms, increasing overall strength (melee damage).

Goes in your sub's Gloves slot.

items.name: Improved Generator
items.description:
An improved generator which helps your sub by increasing energy maintenance and performance.

Goes in the sub's Hat slot.

items.name: Strengthened Metal Hull
items.description:
Adds an additional armor value to your submarine, while increasing durability.

Goes in the sub's Shield slot.

items.name: Submarine AutoRepair Systems
items.description:
An extremely advanced onboard component that allows the submarine to repair itself over time at a slightly faster rate.

Goes in your sub's Leggings slot.

items.name: Submarine Vault
items.description:
An additional onboard vault for your submarine. Increases carry capacity and refrigeration.

Equip it onto the Sub's chestpiece slot.

items.name: Submarine
items.description:
A marvelous, armored underwater vehicle! Use it to explore the deep sea and harvest its resources!

NOTE: Must be placed underwater!

items.name: Submarine Schematics
items.description:
A marvelous, armored underwater vehicle! Use it to explore the deep sea and harvest its resources!

These are Schematics. Put these in something like a storage box, smithy, or fabricator- (something that can hold the resouce cost), then craft this to obtain a Submarine.

items.name: Submarine Schematics (Note)
items.description:
Step one in making a Submarine: write down your plans!

Craft this to draft out your submarine schematics.
